text:
20 life comics about anxiety, social pressure and self-acceptance
07 Nov 2019, 22:00 by Daria Gromova
In them everyone recognizes himself, who constantly analyzes and ponders everything.
The Russian artist under the nickname selfreflexia draws funny and sometimes incredibly accurate comics. They are dedicated to anxiety, attempts to love oneself and find a balance between productivity and personal life.
